title: Best quality for money in area
text: I travel from out of state to work in this part of town once a month and have tried most of the budget hotels in this area. This is my favorite and if I get a good deal I stay here (price between the hotels fluctuate -- Travel Lodge Presidio, Greenwich Inn are also fine options). Rooms clean, staff helpful and it's in good location. Only drawback is that Lombard can be loud so try and get a room beyond the main court yard as traffic and loud passers by can be loud.
